body:
So I find this like so awesome for some reason... Never mind the server glitching and shiz, but look at the light shining! It isn't a texture pack... I am using default but for some reason, there is this exploding tnt in the middle of the air and if you are far enough it makes this amazing shiny light effect around it, but then it disappears... I took a screen before it disappeared!
http://imgur.com/l647FCk
http://imgur.com/tlnK5e9

title: Something interesting...

replies.body: Thats the ender dragon, sometimes it's in it's death animation :P
replies.body_tagged: Thats the ender dragon, sometimes it's in it's death animation :P

replies.body: Well that is some awesome effects right there xD
replies.body_tagged: Well that is some awesome effects right there xD

replies.body: I also like how the light is like in the top of the castle roof on the second pic... it gives it an awesome effect xD
replies.body_tagged: I also like how the light is like in the top of the castle roof on the second pic... it gives it an awesome effect xD

replies.body:
Don't take my word for it, but it seems (quite obviously) that it's the enderdragon dying.
I'm pretty sure that the time bar on top of the screen is the enderdragon's health, and as the time goes the enderdragon loses health. I believe that they do this by dropping tnt on the enderdragon. The timer is put so it matches the enderdragons health degeneration, so when the time dies out, so does the enderdragon.
I might also be pulling this info out of my ass, but you can always ask the Devs.
